snippet: The case of Ms. Davis, the Kentucky county clerk jailed for refusing to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples, has found its way into politics and debates about religious beliefs.
lead_paragraph: The case of Ms. Davis, the Kentucky county clerk jailed for refusing to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples, has found its way into politics and debates about religious beliefs.

headline.main: Reaction to Kim Davis’s Release Floods Social Media

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
